Attribute.name: avtSubsetsMetaData
Attribute.purpose: Information about a particular category of subsets of a mesh (even for material subsets)

Field.name: catName
Field.label: Name (singular form) of category of subsets

Field.name: catCount
Field.label: Number of sets in this category

Field.name: nameScheme
Field.label: Way of naming sets in this category (may be explicit)

Field.name: nameSchemeArrayData
Field.label: 1 or more arrays of ints used in the name scheme

Field.name: nameSchemeArrayOffsets
Field.label: Offsets into nameSchemeArrays to beginning of each array

Field.name: nameSchemeArrayNames
Field.label: Names of each name scheme array

Field.name: colorScheme
Field.label: Colors to be associated with each set in this category

Field.name: setsToChunksMaps
Field.label: A mapping which indicates for each set in this category which chunk(s) it exists on.

Field.name: graphEdges
Field.label: Edges indicating subset/superset relationships between sets in this category

Field.name: isChunkCat
Field.label: Indicates if this category represents (storage) chunks of the mesh (e.g. domains)

Field.name: isMaterialCat
Field.label: Indicates if this category represents a material decomposition

Field.name: isUnionOfChunks
Field.label: Indicates if sets in this category are a simple union of chunks.

Field.name: hasPartialCells
Field.label: Indicates if sets in this category involves cells (zones) that are partially included (e.g. mixing)

Field.name: decompMode
Field.label: Indicates if/how union of all sets in this category covers the whole mesh

Field.name: maxTopoDim
Field.label: Maximum topological dimension of the subset
